channel.title: Multi Npc, hitting through prayer? serveral problems HELP! [PI]
channel.description:
hey, what i wanted is for a npc (8596) to hit through my melee prayer, so i have this in npchandler :
if(c.prayerActive[18] || c.curseActive[9]) { // protect from melee damage = 0; else if (c.prayerActive[18] && npcs[i].npcType == 8596) { damage = damage * 0.78;
that didnt work can anyone tell me why? (im using teamtorva)
. also i wanted to make the area multi, so i made it so more than 1 player can hit a npc, but what i also need is more than 1 npc can hit a player?
i added this in player.java
(absX >= 3065 && absX <= 3081 && absY >= 3795 && absY <= 3814)
and another one in npc.java (for multi players hitting npc)
lastly, i wanted to make 8596 aggressive so i added his case under this. It didnt work? :
public boolean isAggressive(int i) { switch (npcs[i].npcType) { case 6260: case 6261: case 6263: case 6265: case 6222: case 6223: case 6225: case 6227: case 6247: case 6248: case 6250: case 6252: case 1158: case 1160: case 1154: case 1157: case 1156: case 795:
case 8133: case 3101: case 3102: case 5666: case 3103: case 8596:
case 2892: case 2894: case 2881: case 50: case 2882: case 2883:
case 6203: case 6206: case 6208: case 6204: return true; }
1. why doesnt it hit through pray 2. why cant mutliple npc hit a player in the area? 3. why isnt the npc aggressive?
thanks i can offer 2m rsgp if anyone wants to after they help me :3

item.title: Multi Npc, hitting through prayer? serveral problems HELP! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Primate Primate
item.description:
@Primate wrote:

hey, what i wanted is for a npc (8596) to hit through my melee prayer, so i have this in npchandler :

if(c.prayerActive[18] || c.curseActive[9]) { // protect from melee
damage = 0;
else if (c.prayerActive[18] && npcs[i].npcType == 8596) {
damage = damage * 0.78;

that didnt work can anyone tell me why?
(im using teamtorva)

.
also i wanted to make the area multi, so i made it so more than 1 player can hit a npc, but what i also need is more than 1 npc can hit a player?

i added this in player.java

(absX >= 3065 && absX <= 3081 && absY >= 3795 && absY <= 3814)

and another one in npc.java (for multi players hitting npc)

lastly, i wanted to make 8596 aggressive so i added his case under this. It didnt work? :

public boolean isAggressive(int i) {
	switch (npcs[i].npcType) {
		case 6260:
		case 6261:
		case 6263:
		case 6265:
		case 6222:
		case 6223:
		case 6225:
		case 6227:
		case 6247:
		case 6248:
		case 6250:
		case 6252:
		case 1158:
		case 1160:
		case 1154:
		case 1157:
		case 1156:
		case 795:

		case 8133:
		case 3101:
		case 3102:
		case 5666:
		case 3103:
		case 8596:
		
		case 2892:
		case 2894:
		case 2881:
		case 50:
		case 2882:
		case 2883:

		case 6203:
		case 6206:
		case 6208:
		case 6204:
		return true;		
	}
  1. why doesnt it hit through pray
  2. why cant mutliple npc hit a player in the area?
  3. why isnt the npc aggressive?

thanks i can offer 2m rsgp if anyone wants to after they help me :3
